00014 #ifndef U_SMTP_CLIENT_H
00015 #define U_SMTP_CLIENT_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/net/tcpsocket.h>
00018 
00019 #ifdef HAVE_SSL
00020 #  include <ulib/ssl/net/sslsocket.h>
00021 #endif
00022 
00029 /* How to execute an smtp transaction:
00030  *
00031  *   1. Establish the connection
00032  *   2. Read greeting from remote smtp (expect 220)
00033  *   3. Handshake with the SMTP server
00034  *         send "HELO"                 (expect 250)
00035  *         send "MAIL"                 (expect 250)
00036  *         send "RCPT"                 (expect 250)
00037  *   4. Write
00038  *         send "DATA"                 (expect 354)
00039  *         ....................
00040  *         send "<CRLF>.<CRLF>"        (expect 250)
00041  *   5. Quit
00042  *         send "QUIT"                 (expect 221 then disconnect)
00043  */
00044 
00045 class UFileConfig;
00046 
00047 class U_EXPORT USmtpClient : public UTCPSocket {
00048 public:
00049 
00050         enum SMTPClientStatus {
00051                 INIT     =  50,    // not logged in yet
00052                 LOG_IN   = 100,    // logged in, got 220
00053                 READY    = 150,    // sent HELO, got 250
00054                 SENTFROM = 200,    // sent MAIL FROM:, got 250
00055                 SENTTO   = 250,    // sent RCTP TO:, got 250
00056                 DATA     = 300,    // DATA sent, got 354
00057                 FINISHED = 350,    // finished sending data, got 250
00058                 QUIT     = 400,    // sent QUIT, got 221
00059                 LOG_OUT  = 450,    // finished, logged out
00060                 CERROR   = 500     // didn't finish, had error or connection drop
00061                 };
00062 
00063         enum SMTPServerStatus {
00064                 NONE                        =   0, // null
00065                 CONNREFUSED                                              =   1, // No-one listening on the remote address
00066                 GREET                       = 220, // greeting from server
00067                 GOODBYE                     = 221, // server acknolages quit
00068                 SUCCESSFUL                  = 250, // command successful
00069                 READYDATA                   = 354, // server ready to receive data
00070                 UNAVAILABLE                 = 450, // service not available
00071                 ERR_PROCESSING              = 451, // error in processing
00072                 INSUFFICIENT_SYSTEM_STORAGE = 452, // error insufficient system storage
00073                 SERROR                      = 501, // error
00074                 BAD_SEQUENCE_OF_COMMAND     = 503, // error bad sequence of command
00075                 NOT_IMPLEMENT               = 504, // not implemented
00076                 MAILBOX_UNAVAILABLE         = 550, // error mailbox unavailable
00077                 EXCEED_STORAGE_ALLOCATION   = 552, // error exceed storage allocation
00078                 MAILBOX_NAME_NOT_ALLOWED    = 553, // error mailbox name not alloweD
00079                 TRANSACTION_FAILED          = 554  // error transaction failed
00080                 };
00081 
00082         static void str_allocate();
00083 
00084         static const UString* str_empty;
00085         static const UString* str_address;
00086         static const UString* str_subject;
00087         static const UString* str_domainName;
00088         static const UString* str_TO_ADDRESS;
00089         static const UString* str_SMTP_SERVER;
00090         static const UString* str_SENDER_ADDRESS;
00091         static const UString* str_REPLY_TO_ADDRESS;
00092 
00097         USmtpClient(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false) : UTCPSocket(bSocketIsIPv6)
00098                 {
00099                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USmtpClient, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00100 
00101                 state    = INIT;
00102                 response = NONE;
00103 #  ifdef HAVE_SSL
00104                 tls      = 0;
00105 #       endif
00106 
00107                 if (str_empty == 0) str_allocate();
00108                 }
00109 
00110         virtual ~USmtpClient();
00111 
00116         bool connectServer(UFileConfig& file,           int port = 25, uint32_t timeout = U_TIMEOUT);
00117         bool connectServer(const UString& server, int port = 25, uint32_t timeout = U_TIMEOUT);
00118 
00123         char* status();
00124 
00125         UString getSenderAddress() const                { return senderAddress; }
00126         UString getRecipientAddress() const { return rcptoAddress; }
00127 
00128         bool startTLS();
00129         bool sendMessage(bool secure = false);
00130 
00131         void setDomainName(              const UString& name)      { domainName   = name; }
00132         void setMessageBody(        const UString& message)   { messageBody       = message; }
00133         void setMessageHeader(   const UString& header)    { messageHeader  = header; }
00134         void setSenderAddress(   const UString& sender);
00135         void setMessageSubject(  const UString& subject)   { messageSubject = subject; }
00136         void setRecipientAddress(const UString& recipient) { rcptoAddress         = recipient; }
00137 
00138         // DEBUG
00139 
00140 #ifdef DEBUG
00141         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00142 #endif
00143 
00144 protected:
00145 #ifdef HAVE_SSL
00146         USSLSocket* tls;
00147 #endif
00148 
00149         UString domainName, senderAddress, rcptoAddress, messageSubject, messageBody, messageHeader;
00150         SMTPClientStatus state;
00151         int response;
00152 
00153         static char buffer[128];
00154 
00155 private:
00156         void setStateFromResponse() U_NO_EXPORT;
00157         bool syncCommand(const char* format, ...) U_NO_EXPORT; // Send a command to the SMTP server and wait for a response
00158 
00159         USmtpClient(const USmtpClient&) : UTCPSocket(false) {}
00160         USmtpClient& operator=(const USmtpClient&)                       { return *this; }
00161 };
